name: Revolution Capital Group
overview:
Revolution Capital Group is a US-based privately funded, global investment firm focused on acquiring and operating companies for long term growth and value creation in the lower middle market. Revolution often works in partnership with management to build firms. Additionally, the firm partners with like minded private equity firms and hedge funds on select transactions. The firm looks to operate businesses for long term growth.

Revolution is a generalist group, willing to consider opportunities in niche manufacturing, business services, software, information technology, telecommunications, distribution and logistics, healthcare products and services, media, leisure, consumer goods and services, and oil and gas services. The group was formed in 2009 and has offices in Los Angeles, California and London, United Kingdom.
